name: Friday Night Event
description:
Friday Night Event Figure out which of your friends is the real king of the ring in this improv party game for 3-6 players. In Friday Night Event, take on the role of wacky randomly generated wrestlers with bizarre gimmicks as you try to break your opponents with comedy skill and might and gain heat. All you need is a pack of cards and some funny friends. *

*Funny friends not included.

Players: 3-6

Playtime: 15-30 minutes

Tool Needed: Playing Cards, 90 Second Timer, Notepad
